verses.verse: So when <S%H1732>David<s%> was <S%H2204>old<s%> and <S%H7646>full<s%> of <S%H3117>days,<s%> he made <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> his <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H4427>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
And he <S%H622>gathered<s%> together <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8269>princes<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> with the <S%H3548>priests<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites.<s%>

Now the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H5608>numbered<s%> from the <S%H1121>age<s%> of <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward:<s%> and their <S%H4557>number<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls,<s%> <S%H1397>man<s%> by <S%H1397>man,<s%> was <S%H7970>thirty<s%> and <S%H8083>eight<s%> <S%H505>thousand.<s%>

Of <S%H428>which,<s%> <S%H6242>twenty<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> were to <S%H5329>set<s%> <S%H5921>forward<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and <S%H8337>six<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> were <S%H7860>officers<s%> and <S%H8199>judges:<s%>

Moreover <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> were <S%H7778>porters;<s%> and <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H1984>praised<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> with the <S%H3627>instruments<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I <S%H6213>made,<s%> said David, to <S%H1984>praise<s%> therewith.

And <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H2505>divided<s%> them into <S%H4256>courses<s%> among the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi,<s%> namely, <S%H1647>Gershon,<s%> <S%H6955>Kohath,<s%> and <S%H4847>Merari.<s%>
Of the <S%H1649>Gershonites<s%> were, <S%H3936>Laadan,<s%> and <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3936>Laadan;<s%> the <S%H7218>chief<s%> was <S%H3171>Jehiel,<s%> and <S%H2241>Zetham,<s%> and <S%H3100>Joel,<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei;<s%> <S%H8013>Shelomith,<s%> and <S%H2381>Haziel,<s%> and <S%H2039>Haran,<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers<s%> of <S%H3936>Laadan.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei<s%> were, <S%H3189>Jahath,<s%> <S%H2126>Zina,<s%> and <S%H3266>Jeush,<s%> and <S%H1283>Beriah.<s%> <S%H428>These<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8096>Shimei.<s%>

And <S%H3189>Jahath<s%> was the <S%H7218>chief,<s%> and <S%H2125>Zizah<s%> the <S%H8145>second:<s%> but <S%H3266>Jeush<s%> and <S%H1283>Beriah<s%> had not <S%H7235>many<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%> therefore they were in <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H6486>reckoning,<s%> according to their <S%H1>father's<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6955>Kohath;<s%> <S%H6019>Amram,<s%> <S%H3324>Izhar,<s%> <S%H2275>Hebron,<s%> and <S%H5816>Uzziel,<s%> <S%H702>four.<s%>

The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6019>Amram;<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H914>separated,<s%> that he should <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, he and his <S%H1121>sons<s%> for <S%H5769>ever,<s%> to <S%H6999>burn<s%> <S%H6999>incense<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> to <S%H8334>minister<s%> to him, and to <S%H1288>bless<s%> in his <S%H8034>name<s%> for <S%H5769>ever.<s%>
Now concerning <S%H4872>Moses<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H430>God,<s%> his <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H7121>named<s%> of the <S%H7626>tribe<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4872>Moses<s%> were, <S%H1648>Gershom,<s%> and <S%H461>Eliezer.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1648>Gershom,<s%> <S%H7619>Shebuel<s%> was the <S%H7218>chief.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> were, <S%H7345>Rehabiah<s%> the <S%H7218>chief.<s%> And <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>none<s%> <S%H312>other<s%> <S%H1121>sons;<s%> but the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7345>Rehabiah<s%> were <S%H4605>very<s%> <S%H7235>many.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3324>Izhar;<s%> <S%H8019>Shelomith<s%> the <S%H7218>chief.<s%>

Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2275>Hebron;<s%> <S%H3404>Jeriah<s%> the <S%H7218>first,<s%> <S%H568>Amariah<s%> the <S%H8145>second,<s%> <S%H3166>Jahaziel<s%> the <S%H7992>third,<s%> and <S%H3360>Jekameam<s%> the <S%H7243>fourth.<s%>
Of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5816>Uzziel;<s%> <S%H4318>Micah<s%> the first <S%H7218><s%>and <S%H3449>Jesiah<s%> the <S%H8145>second.<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4847>Merari;<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> and <S%H4187>Mushi.<s%> The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4249>Mahli;<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar,<s%> and <S%H7027>Kish.<s%>

And <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H4191>died,<s%> and <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> but <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> and their <S%H251>brothers<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7027>Kish<s%> <S%H5375>took<s%> them.
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4187>Mushi;<s%> <S%H4249>Mahli,<s%> and <S%H5740>Eder,<s%> and <S%H3406>Jeremoth,<s%> <S%H7969>three.<s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> were the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> after the <S%H1004>house<s%> of their <S%H1>fathers;<s%> even the <S%H7218>chief<s%> of the <S%H1>fathers,<s%> as they were <S%H6485>counted<s%> by <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H8034>names<s%> by their <S%H1538>polls,<s%> that <S%H6213>did<s%> the <S%H4399>work<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> from the <S%H1121>age<s%> of <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> and <S%H4605>upward.<s%>

For <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> has given <S%H5117>rest<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> that they may <S%H7931>dwell<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> for <S%H5769>ever:<s%>

And <S%H1571>also<s%> to the <S%H3881>Levites;<s%> they shall <S%H369>no<s%> more <S%H5375>carry<s%> the <S%H4908>tabernacle,<s%> nor <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H3627>vessels<s%> of it for the <S%H5656>service<s%> thereof.

For by the <S%H314>last<s%> <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H4557>numbered<s%> from <S%H6242>twenty<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> <S%H1121>old<s%> and <S%H4605>above:<s%>

<S%H3588>Because<s%> their <S%H4612>office<s%> was to <S%H3027>wait<s%> on the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> for the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> in the <S%H2691>courts,<s%> and in the <S%H3957>chambers,<s%> and in the <S%H2893>purifying<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> things, and the <S%H4639>work<s%> of the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H430>God;<s%>

Both for the show <S%H3899>bread,<s%> <S%H4635><s%> and for the fine <S%H5560>flour<s%> for meat <S%H4503>offering,<s%> and for the <S%H4682>unleavened<s%> <S%H7550>cakes,<s%> and for that which is baked in the <S%H4227>pan,<s%> and for that which is <S%H7246>fried,<s%> and for <S%H3605>all<s%> manner of <S%H4884>measure<s%> and <S%H4060>size;<s%>
And to <S%H5975>stand<s%> every <S%H1242>morning<s%> to <S%H3034>thank<s%> and <S%H1984>praise<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and <S%H3651>likewise<s%> at <S%H6153>even:<s%>

And to <S%H5927>offer<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H5930>burnt<s%> sacrifices to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> in the <S%H7676>sabbaths,<s%> in the <S%H2320>new<s%> <S%H2320>moons,<s%> and on the <S%H4150>set<s%> <S%H4150>feasts,<s%> by <S%H4557>number,<s%> according to the <S%H4941>order<s%> commanded to them, <S%H8548>continually<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD:<s%>

And that they should <S%H8104>keep<s%> the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H6944>holy<s%> place, and the <S%H4931>charge<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> their <S%H251>brothers,<s%> in the <S%H5656>service<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD.<s%>
